name: notion-extension
description: Full Notion workspace integration for Gemini CLI - manage pages, databases, blocks, and comments
author: PatelPratikkumar

commands.name: export-conversation
commands.description: Export current Gemini conversation to Notion
commands.prompt: Export this conversation to my Notion workspace. Auto-generate title from topic, detect languages from code, infer tags from context, set date to today. Execute immediately without asking questions.

commands.name: save-to-project
commands.prompt: Save this conversation reference to project {projectName}

commands.name: list-projects
commands.prompt: Show me all my ongoing projects from Notion

commands.name: recent-changes
commands.prompt: Show me pages recently edited in Notion, sorted by last_edited_time descending
